TopicTitle: Overjay has docked with tje SpacePort

Articles.Content:
Greetings everyone!

I'm not a newbie pilot, been playing KSP since 0.20. But only recently I have discovered that concentration of fun and ideas, which situated here!

I'll try to add my part of those two magic ingredients to the solution. See you in space!
Hello Overjay. Welcome to the forum.
Welcome aboard, cadet! We're all glad to have you!
